CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains the warm-up task to MOT . CHI enters the room and goes immediately over to the toys on the floor . MOT sits on the floor
CHI bends down and looks at the book on the floor
MOT settles objects in the bags she brought in with her
CHI looks at the picture book
MOT turns and looks at CHI
<bef> MOT moves closer to CHI . MOT moves the football out of the way
<aft> MOT looks down at the book
CHI watches MOT move the football out of the way
CHI shifts her weight from one leg to the other
CHI turns a page in the book
MOT puts CHI on her lap
CHI looks down at the book
MOT opens the book up in front of CHI
MOT holds the book open in front of CHI and looks at it
CHI looks down at the book
MOT points to a picture in the book
MOT still points to the page
CHI points to picture of fish
CHI points and looks at the picture
MOT points to the picture and looks at CHI
CHI reaches out for the picture on the opposite page
CHI looks up and shakes her head no
CHI points up into the air while still looking at the book
CHI stares blankly at the book
MOT points to the ice cream
CHI nods and looks down at the picture
CHI points to a picture and looks at the book
MOT tries to turn the page back
CHI looks down at the page
MOT points to picture of kitty
CHI stares blankly at the book
MOT points to the same picture
CHI looks at the picture and then points into the air
MOT is responding to CHI's previous utterance
MOT points at the picture and looks at CHI
CHI looks down at the book
<aft> MOT stops pointing at the picture and turns to focus on the opposite page
MOT points to the lamb in the book
CHI stares blankly at the book
CHI points to the picture of birdnest briefly . CHI stares at the book
<$=1> MOT points to the same picture
MOT points to a different picture
CHI points to the picture and looks at it
CHI points and looks down at the picture
MOT leans close to CHI and looks in her face
CHI shakes her head and looks at the picture
<aft> CHI starts to turn the page
MOT helps CHI turn the page
CHI looks down at the page
MOT points to the picture in the book
CHI looks at the picture and points
MOT still points to the picture and leans close to CHI and looks at her
CHI looks at the picture and points
CHI looks at the picture and points
CHI looks down at the next page
MOT leans close as she talks to CHI
MOT points to the picture on the other page
CHI points to the picture and looks at it
MOT points to the page and looks at CHI
CHI points to the picture and looks at it
CHI tries to make a truck noise
CHI points to the picture and looks at it
CHI looks down at the page
CHI points to the same picture
CHI shakes her had as she looks at the picture which she is still pointing at
CHI points to the picture and looks at it
MOT bangs up and down on the book with her fist
MOT starts to turn next page
CHI tries to climb off MOT lap
MOT holds book open for CHI
CHI turns and looks at the book
MOT holds the book and looks down at the pictures
CHI looks down at the book
MOT closes the book and puts it on the floor
CHI crouches by the jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI picks up the jack+in+the+box
CHI sits on MOT lap holding the jack+in+the+box
CHI pulls the jack+in+the+box up onto her lap and has some trouble setting it straight
<$=1> MOT holds the jack+in+the+box steady for CHI
CHI turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box and watches CHI
CHI slows down her rate of turning
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box and watches CHI
<bef> CHI stops turning the handle . CHI tries to get off MOT's lap
<$=1> MOT leans down and looks at CHI closely
CHI struggles to get off MOT's lap
CHI tries to get off MOT's lap
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box and CHI
CHI looks down at the jack+in+the+box
MOT leans close and looks at CHI
CHI points to the clown's eyes
<$=1> MOT holds clown's head out and shakes it
MOT pushes the clown down into the jack+in+the+box
CHI helps MOT push the clown into the box
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box out in front of CHI
CHI turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box briefly then starts to wriggle restlessly on MOT's lap
DCA only if CHI's nonverbal was communicative
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box on the floor
rhetorical question about car CHI is clearly looking at
not CT since can't be sure what CHI said
CHI rolls the car on the ground
CHI looks back at MOT and around the room
MOT taps the top of the chair
MOT throws the ball to CHI
CHI looks down at the floor
CHI doesn't catch the ball and ball bounces off CHI's chest
CHI looks down at the ball on the floor
MOT holds out the ball to CHI
CHI knocks the ball out of MOT's hand

INV enters the room and explains Small Scale Activity to MOT then leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV re-enters the room at 12:25:10 and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and gives CHI the squeaky toy to hold .
CHI is standing facing the table holding the toy
INV takes the Forbidden Object out of the drawer and puts it on the table
MOT kneels on the floor near CHI and moves her bottle out of the way on the table
CHI looks at the object and blinks
INV sets the object in motion
CHI stares at the object and reaches for MOT
CHI reaches out to MOT with the toy in her hand still staring at the object
MOT takes the toy from CHI
MOT smiles and looks at CHI
CHI turns and looks at MOT
MOT holds the toy up and looks at CHI
CHI turns and stares at the object
CHI smiles and looks at the object
CHI starts to reach back for MOT
CHI holds out her arms to MOT
<aft> CHI looks down at MOT's lap
CHI comes closer to the object
CHI stares at the object and starts to reach for it
MOT leans close to CHI and puts her hand up in a gesture of restraint
CHI watches INV put the Forbidden Object away
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV picks up the toys from Small Scale Activity
MOT sits in the chair at the desk and picks up the Ball box
CHI looks up at the box
MOT puts the box on her lap
MOT lowers the ball box to CHI's eye level
CHI puts her hands on the edge of the box
MOT puts the box on the floor
CHI takes the ball out of the box
MOT's face is out of camera view
CHI turns and faces the wall
CHI bounces the ball on the floor
<bef> CHI watches the ball roll around on the floor
CHI pushes the chair with wheels
MOT's head still out of camera view
CHI continues to push the chair
CHI looks at the table with the boxes on it and leans against the chair
CHI looks down towards the floor
<1-4> MOT points to the ball on the floor
CHI looks down at the floor then up at the desk
CHI walks over to the desk and puts her hands on it
CHI stands next facing the desk
CHI looks up at the desk and points to something off camera
MOT is referring to the object CHI pointed to
<5> MOT taps her hand on the next PCI box
<bef> CHI looked at MOT . CHI looks at the next activity box
MOT points to the empty ball box on the floor
CHI runs over and picks up the ball
MOT's head still not in camera view
CHI walks over to the box . <aft> CHI puts the ball into the box
CHI looks up at the desk
MOT takes the box and puts it on the table
CHI points to something on the table
CHI points to the next box
MOT takes the next box down from the table
MOT holds the box in front of CHI
<aft> MOT lowers the box to the floor
MOT puts the box on the floor
MOT opens the box and reaches in it
CHI looks down at the towel then up at MOT
MOT unfolds the towel then holds it up in front of her
MOT pops out from behind the towel
CHI looks down at the box
CHI looks down towards the empty box
CHI looks down at the box
CHI bends down and touches the empty box
CHI seems to be scratching the box
MOT holds out the towel to CHI
CHI walks over to the desk
MOT holds the cloth out to CHI
CHI points to the boxes on the desk
CHI continues to point to the box as she turns and looks at MOT
CHI runs over to the other side of the room
MOT puts the towel on her lap
MOT's head is still not in camera view
CHI points up to the picture on the wall
the camera moves to follow CHI
CHI turns around and looks up at the camera
CHI looks at the camera and points to it
MOT puts the towel into the box
MOT picks the box up and puts it on the desk
MOT brings another box down from the desk
MOT puts the box down on the floor and starts to pull the cover up
CHI puts her hands on the lid closing it
CHI looks down at the box
CHI removes her hands and sits back watching MOT
CHI tries to pull off the cover
the box is not fully open . the lid is tipped up but still conceals CHI's view of the contents of the box
CHI looks at contents of box
MOT looks down into the box
CHI puts her hand into the box
CHI lays on her stomach and looks at the paper
MOT sits back up on the chair and watches CHI
CHI stops drawing and reaches for something
MOT is almost totally out of camera view
CHI picks up a crayon and starts to sit up
CHI looks down at the crayons in her hand
<$=1> MOT takes out a piece of paper and puts it on the lid of the box
CHI watches MOT and motions to the paper with a crayon
MOT puts the paper on the lid in front of CHI
MOT picks up some crayons and puts them on the box
MOT puts several crayons in front of CHI
CHI looks up at the crayons MOT put on the lid
CHI points to the sheets of paper in the box . <aft> CHI lets go of her crayon and looks down at the lid
CHI examines the crayon in her hand
CHI looks down at the paper
the paper start to slip off of the edge of the lid
MOT slides paper back onto the lid
CHI looks down at the paper
<bef> CHI stops drawing and puts her crayon down on the lid
CHI looks up at MOT and points to crayon
CHI points to MOT and looks at the paper
CHI stares down at MOT's drawing
CHI stares down at the picture
CHI stops drawing and picks up a different crayon
CHI picks up another crayon and draws
CHI holds down the paper with her other hand
CHI stops drawing and puts her crayon down
CHI looks down at the crayons
MOT holds out a crayon to CHI and looks at her
CHI takes the crayon and draws briefly
CHI stares down at the paper
CHI looks down at the crayons
MOT holds out another crayon to CHI
CHI takes the crayon from MOT
<aft> MOT reaches around CHI to pull up her overall strap
CHI looks down at the paper
CHI points at the crayons and looks down at them
MOT looks at what CHI is pointing to
CHI examines the crayons lying on the box
CHI stares down at the paper
<aft> MOT picks up another sheet of paper
MOT holds another sheet in front of CHI
<aft> MOT puts the paper down in front of CHI
CHI looks down at the paper
CHI looks up at MOT briefly and then down at the paper
CHI holds out a crayon to MOT and then holds it back over the paper
CHI looks down at the paper
MOT moves the paper closer to her on the lid . <aft> MOT begins to draw
MOT's intonation suggests reluctance but she complies with request
MOT looks down at the paper
MOT looks down at the paper
CHI watches MOT a little more
CHI starts to pull herself up by the chair
MOT stops drawing and puts her crayon down on the paper
CHI looks down at the paper
MOT pushes the paper towards CHI
CHI stands and points to the boxes on the table
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI points to the boxes on the table
MOT puts the paper away then puts box up on desk
CHI has walked out of camera view
MOT takes the box down and puts it on the floor
MOT holds the lid up in the air
<bef> CHI reaches in the box . CHI takes the book out and holds it
CHI looks down at the cover of the book
MOT puts her hand on the edge of the book
CHI looks down at the picture MOT pointed to
the camera moves to keep CHI in focus
CHI looks up at the camera
MOT looks up at the camera
CHI looks back at the book
CHI wriggles around on the floor restlessly
MOT holds out the book for CHI
<$=1> MOT holds out book for CHI
CHI looks up at the desk
CHI goes over to the desk
CHI is off screen near the desk
MOT start to open the book box
MOT holds the book in front of CHI
MOT gets up and puts the box on the table

CHI is off screen and the camera moves making a noise
